name: Love Booth
description:
Love Booth

(made for olc::BeatTheBoredom jam)

In a post-quarantine 2020 world efforts are made to avoid contamination risks and this is applied to all aspects of life. Couples still love to enter Photo Booths to immortalize  a moment togheter, but it's safe to stay inside the shortest possible time.

You're a new developed AI module installed on the Love Booth machine and your task is to figure out if the two's are a love couple or not, in order to reduce the virus-exposition risks.

Do they look like a couple? Give 'em a nice lovely print. Do they not? Take the photo and have them out as soon as you can!
